features: [Extendable Pole Design] -The optional extension pole makes the broom length from 39.76 to 51.18 inches, People can choose the appropriate length according to their height. And long handle allow you to Stand upright for comfortable sweeping.NO MORE BENDING!

[Heavy duty Broom bristles] - 2023 Upgraded four-row bristles design, high quality broom bristle construction, More dense and durable. Eco-friendly fiber made from recycled PET bottles. Kelamayi insists on working hard to protect the environment.

[Easy Stand-up Storage] - The clip-on feature makes the broom and dustpan upright a perfect space safer! Compact storage keep your home or work space clean and tidy. Works perfectly for multi-surface, Suitable for indoor use.

[Self-Cleaning Dustpan Teeth] - Built in scraper and comb/Teeth for easy to Clean Broom into Dustpan , Clean Pet Hair and Human Hair with one Pull on the Teeth. The rubber lip of the dust pan is flush with the floor and the teeth clean out the bristles easily.

[Powerful After-Service] - Every customer can enjoy 30 days refund or replacement, No question asked. Please contact us firstly when you have any questions, risk-free guarantee provides a reliable purchasing experience, your satisfaction is our boundless motivation!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Best Choice: Kelamayi Upgrade Broom and Dustpan Set If you are looking for a handy Broom and Dustpan Set that can sweep home, kitchen, office or outdoor more easily. Rubber Lip Design The mouth of the dust pan adopts the integrated TPR flat rubber lip, and it conforms to clean all garbage and debris into dustpan, not swept underneath it. Four-layer Bristers The unique 4-layer PET bottles design does not hurt the wooden floor and is suitable for various surface.The broom has an angled head to allow it to sweep corners and edges with ease! Sturdy Broom and Dustpan Premium quality built to last. kelamayi broom and dustpan sets made from high quality, durable materials. You may have had experience in the past about handles that loose easily, thus we use stainless steel handles and these handles are well made and very durable to ensure a long life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny.
reviews.reviewText: This product is precisely what I needed for my home. Assembly is just attaching handle segments together and that's it.The broom is excellent, with very dense bristles that miss nothing on the floors. It handles well, and it gets into corners reasonably well, but could be a tad better.The dust pan is sturdy. I haven't had to see if the cleaning "fingers" clean the broom well, because it's too new yet, but they look they will do a good job at that. The shape of the bin allows it to stand with the opening up or down, with or without the broom attached. The slanted lip at the front catches everything from the broom on the first sweep, and very thorough. And I love the color; not too "industrial."The only thing I would improve is the hanger holes at the handle tips. They should have a much larger vertical hole, perhaps square shaped, to allow the product to accept different kinds of wall hooks. They are very narrow horizontal slots currently, so you'll need to do some searching for a proper wall hook.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This handled dustpan is a breeze to use & is good quality. The broom is not the best but I have a good broom so I’m ok with that. It was easy to assemble & seems durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Read the Instructions
reviews.reviewText: I was very ready to come write a negative review but forced myself to take a step back and I’m glad I did. Let me start by saying this, it’s very important you assemble this correctly.Each box comes with a variety of pieces. The “A” vs “B” isn’t what matters. It’s the pieces with plastic screws vs metal ones. To make it simple, the plastic pieces go into the broom and dust pan. DO NOT try to put them into the other poles. I did that on first try and my broom couldn’t stay together. As soon as I took it apart and started over it assembled extremely easily. Now the broom and dust pan are sturdy.The dust pan when on its own doesn’t stand very straight. However, once you attach the broom, it stands with no problem. It’s a good length but be aware the broom itself is rather small and stiff. It works well for sweeping floors but don’t expect some professional level broom.All in all, it’s probably more like 3.5 stars but I rounded up because it’s honestly fine. If you put it together correctly it’s a good broom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PINK is my Color!
reviews.reviewText: When I saw this came in pink, I was sold! It is so cute in person and it is beyond sturdy. It’s good for quick clean ups and I have even used it to sweep my whole living room. It made picking up the dust so much faster and way easier on my back! Love this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The description and claimed MSRP are GIMMICKS
reviews.reviewText: First Impressions:1) it is NOT extendable. This claim is a GIMMICK. It simply has two 3-piece poles. They claim it is extendable and adjustable to suit your height. I am 5'6", and fully assembled it is OK, but a little short for me. The only adjustment is to remove the middle pole piece and make it 2' tall...NO GOOD. I am quite short, and I feel this needs to be taller.2) it is NOT sturdy. the pole sections are flimsy, very thin metal, and definitely not something that will withstand a lot of usage3) they claimed list price is $49.95 on sale for $29.95. I would put the fair price point at $19.95 perhaps even $24.95. BUT this list price is a GIMMICK4) it doesn't stand well on its own, but I don't call this a negative since I'd rather have taller poles for ergonomics. So, I'd rather they supply poles tall enough for a 5.5' man and drop the claim of it standing up on its own5) it's not really designed for holding a bag. It does have clips, but either the bag or the dustpan squeegy becomes moot....and it doesn't fit the grocery store bags that became outlawed this month in PA.....and IT DOESN'T COME WITH OR HAVE ANY BAG OPTIONSSo, TWO GIMMICKS, and some advertising stretches of truthOn the plus side, the dust pan head and the rake head seem good enough on first impression. There is a rubber squeegy on the dustpan head. I would rather this not be on there because, after all, this is for picking up dog droppings in a yard....so it serves no purpose and makes cleaning it by garden hose problematic because of the interface gap between the squeegy rubber and squeegy metal from, as well as the squeegy metal frame and dustpan.And, I like that it closes to create a seal, so if it is propped up against a tree and it rains, the droppings won't turn into pudding.All of that said, I still give it 3 stars on first impression, because I understand the advertising gimmicks on Amazon, and it's best to rate relative to everything else. 2.5 stars may be more appropriate, but I will revisit once I've used it for a while

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive And Attractive
reviews.reviewText: I am really impressed with this. Easy to put together and works well. Also attractive looking. I live in the desert and have a constant battle with sand coming in the house so this is perfect for keeping the floors clean in between the weekly vacuuming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It goes together easily, has extra long handles for my tall husband, and it has a nice rubber edge to get all of the small particles. Some folks claimed that the dustpan handle wouldn't stay up, but it will lock into place with a little extra push. That way you can leave it standing while you sweep. I love it!

reviews.reviewTitle: Es práctica pero la escoba no es funcional
reviews.reviewText: La escoba no es muy funcional. Puede servir para limpiezas superficiales.
Pour balayer la maison et je suis très satisfaite c’est ce que je voulais
